What is the purpose of the 'key' attribute in a v-for directive in Vue.js
answers: To provide a unique identifier for each element in a list
To define the order of elements
To bind data to list items
correctAnswer: To provide a unique identifier for each element
To define the order of elements

question: What is the purpose of the 'nextTick' method in Vue.js?
answers: To delay the execution of a function until the next DOM update cycle
To navigate to the next route in Vue Router
To proceed to the next item in a v-for loop
To update data properties in the next component update
correctAnswer: To delay the execution of a function until the next DOM update cycle
